ttp_template:
<group name="ospf_pid_vrf">
 OSPF Process ID {{OSPF_PID}} VRF {{VRF | ORPHRASE}}
<group name="interface_ip_address_neighbor_id">
 {{NEIGHBOR_ID}} 1 {{STATE | ORPHRASE}} {{UPTIME | ORPHRASE}} {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
</group>
cli_content:
OSPF Process ID DC_UNDERLAY VRF default
 Total number of neighbors: 3
 Neighbor ID     Pri State            Up Time  Address         Interface
 192.168.1.8       1 FULL/ -          2y0w     192.168.2.2     Vlan2
 192.168.1.3       1 FULL/ -          2y10w    192.168.1.3    Eth1/1
 192.168.1.4       1 FULL/ -          2y11w    192.168.1.4    Eth1/2
textfsm_template:
Value Filldown OSPF_PID (\S+)
Value Filldown VRF (\S+)
Value NEIGHBOR_ID (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value STATE (\S+.\/.\S+)
Value UPTIME (\S+)
Value IP_ADDRESS (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value Required INTERFACE (\S+)

Start
  ^\s+\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+\s+${OSPF_PID}\s+[Vv][Rr][Ff]\s+${VRF} -> Record
  ^\s+${NEIGHBOR_ID}\s+\d+\s+${STATE}\s+${UPTIME}\s+${IP_ADDRESS}\s+${INTERFACE} -> Record
